projects.title: OZXK Blog | Full Stack React Project
projects.description: This project is a personal blog site that I built with React, Next.js and SASS. It features a content management system that I designed and implemented with Node.js and MongoDB. The CMS allows me to create and edit my blog posts and manage my website settings with ease. You can find the source code of this project on Github.

projects.title: Freelance Wordpress Projects
projects.description: I have been working as a freelance Wordpress developer for the past 4 years. I have created 6 live Wordpress websites for various clients in different industries. Some of the websites I have developed include local businesses, e-commerce platforms, and learning management systems. Through these projects, I have acquired skills in SEO, caching strategies, minification and lazy loading, and UI/UX design.
